css: .cover-innovative-loesungen-section { padding: 2rem; background-color: #e5e7eb; } .container { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 2rem; } @media (min-width: 768px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } } .card { background-color: var(--color-light); border-radius: 1.5rem; padding: 3rem; height: 100%; } .content-card { display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; } .pre-title { font-size: 0.8rem; font-weight: 600; color: var(--color-secondary); margin-bottom: 1.5rem; } h1 { font-size: clamp(2rem, 5vw, 2.75rem); font-weight: 700; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; } .content-card p { margin-bottom: 2rem; } .btn-dark { align-self: flex-start; padding: 0.8rem 2rem; background-color: var(--color-dark); color: var(--color-light); border-radius: 0.5rem; font-weight: 600; text-decoration: none; } .image-card { padding: 0; overflow: hidden; } .image-card img { width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; }
